channel.title: Prayer
channel.description:
i can get prayer to deactivate (no green) when entering an area but if the prayer that i deactivate is on before going to the area it will keep draining the prayer even though the green was taken away aka deactivated. do i have to do somethin client side if so where should i look ;-)?
ex [code=java](player.getLocation().incustomarea() && prayerID == 8) { deactivatePrayer(player, 8); player.getActionSender().sendMessage([/code]
the msg sends once i try to activate prayer once its deactivate but as i said the drainrate is still there even though not active.
basically it will keep draining even if i activate it but it deactivates right away
example. i activate prayer in duel it says cant use prayer and it doesnt drain. here it does same thing as dueling(turns green then white really quick) but drains and says cant use prayer. so im doin somethin wrong...

item.title: Prayer
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:7, topic:462928”]activatedPrayers[8] = false;
removePrayerDrain(8);
player.getActionSender().sendPrayers();

I think[/quote]

ty u shined the light on my problem

i think my problem was my if statement didnt make sense lol… thats why it wasnt workin before.

always learning

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

i did check the killedBy method on the Player class, also on load there is more prayer stuff

for (int x = 0; x < activatedPrayers.length; x++) { if (activatedPrayers[x]) { activatedPrayers[x] = false; } removePrayerDrain(x); } actionSender.sendPrayers();

Read full topic
